attributes.action: Prevent excessive profits of energy suppliers by limiting the amount paid to shareholders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Preventing by law the massive profits that energy companies are making by not passing on wholesale reductions to the customer is needed to prevent fuel poverty and damage to the economy by raising production and travel costs.

Such companies should be restricted by law in to a maximum return (in percentage points to net profits) to shareholders. The balance should be returned to the consumer as a rebate or in vouchers that can be used for energy saving products/services.
